attributes.action: Apologise for the response to the petition to "make Jeremy Clarkson prime Minister"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The response gained from the government in response to the petition was unpredented.  It was a frivolos waste of money & resources.

It also undermined the opinions of the public.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
